articles.author: Jacopo Barigazzi
articles.title: EU leaders deflect Trump on Greenland and on tariffs - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: EU leaders are looking for a way to keep Trump from invading the Danish territory.
articles.content:
"When targeted, unfairly or arbitrarily, the European Union will respond firmly," she said.
